ΛvₑZ2 Lol, this IS ntr.  Translations are just translations, but are never 100% accurate.

I actually understand Japanese from a cultural and language standpoint.  I can tell you've never in your life talked to someone who was actually Japanese about the term, otherwise you wouldn't say something so stupid and inaccurate.  わかったか？何も知らないのにそんなに偉そうな態度。

Time to move mc.  It's not NTR you idiots. Couples gotta be married for it to be NTR. "A Japanese slang term that literally translates to "cuckolding", which refers to a sexual fetish involving a man with an adulterous wife." There's more to it but it's not correct to its real meaning. Here's the rest "More broadly, the term may also refer to works of adult fiction that involve blackmail and cheating."
This reminds me of my crush

@stylez479 Does it matter if he breaks up with her or not? She's clearly not even with him, anymore. They're effectively broken up already. Also, most NTR ends with the guy breaking up IF he finds out about it and the girl hasn't already left him. If he stays with her, then it's netorase, not netorare.

Take the recording and burn it into a DVD. Go over when they are all home at night and play the surprise. Would parents get angry? And if anyone gets pissed, just say you sent a copy to the school and the video to the underground school website (you know there is one) and then break up with her by saying 'I can't date someone who fucks her brother.'

The story is generic and the NTR is very weak, but I was actually entertained until the doujin decided to ruin itself with those last few pages. They were so weak and empty. And honestly, if you ask me, the real tragedy of this story is the fact that Touwa stopped wearing glasses because of that guy. She was so much cuter before. I'm seething right now. Fuck this. You don't touch the fucking glasses of my hentai waifus.
